verses.text: \w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* to them that \w devise|strong="H2803"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*, and \w work|strong="H6466"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* upon their \w beds|strong="H4904"\w*! when the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* is \w light|strong="H0216"\w*, they \w practise|strong="H6213"\w* it, because it \w is|strong="H3426"\w* in the \w power|strong="H0410"\w* of their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

And they \w covet|strong="H2530"\w* \w fields|strong="H7704"\w*, and take \add them\add* by \w violence|strong="H1497"\w*; and \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, and take \add them\add* \w away|strong="H5375"\w*: so they \w oppress|strong="H6231"\w* a \w man|strong="H1397"\w* and his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, even a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* and his \w heritage|strong="H5159"\w*.\f + \fr 2.2 \ft oppress: or, defraud\f*

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; Behold, against this \w family|strong="H4940"\w* do I \w devise|strong="H2803"\w* an \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, from which ye shall not \w remove|strong="H4185"\w* your \w necks|strong="H6677"\w*; neither shall ye \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w haughtily|strong="H7317"\w*: for this \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \add is\add* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.

¶ In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall \add one\add* take \w up|strong="H5375"\w* a \w parable|strong="H4912"\w* against you, and \w lament|strong="H5091"\w* with a \w doleful|strong="H5093"\w* \w lamentation|strong="H5092"\w*, \add and\add* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, We be \w utterly|strong="H7703"\w* \w spoiled|strong="H7703"\w*: he hath \w changed|strong="H4171"\w* the \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: how hath he \w removed|strong="H4185"\w* \add it\add* from me! turning \w away|strong="H7725"\w* he hath \w divided|strong="H2505"\w* our \w fields|strong="H7704"\w*.\f + \fr 2.4 \ft a doleful…: Heb. a lamentation of lamentations\f*\f + \fr 2.4 \ft turning…: or, instead of restoring\f*

Therefore thou shalt have none that shall \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* a \w cord|strong="H2256"\w* by \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* in the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

\w Prophesy|strong="H5197"\w* ye not, \add say they to them that\add* \w prophesy|strong="H5197"\w*: they shall not \w prophesy|strong="H5197"\w* to them, \add that\add* they shall not \w take|strong="H5253"\w* \w shame|strong="H3639"\w*.\f + \fr 2.6 \ft Prophesy ye…: or, Prophesy not as they prophesy: Heb. Drop, etc\f*

¶ O \add thou that art\add* \w named|strong="H0559"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, is the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w straitened|strong="H7114"\w*? \add are\add* these his \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*? do not my \w words|strong="H1697"\w* do \w good|strong="H3190"\w* to him that \w walketh|strong="H1980"\w* \w uprightly|strong="H3477"\w*?\f + \fr 2.7 \ft straitened: or, shortened?\f*\f + \fr 2.7 \ft uprightly: Heb. upright?\f*

Even of \w late|strong="H0865"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* is risen \w up|strong="H6965"\w* as an \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*: ye pull \w off|strong="H6584"\w* the \w robe|strong="H0145"\w* \w with|strong="H4136"\w* the \w garment|strong="H8008"\w* from them that \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* by \w securely|strong="H0983"\w* as men \w averse|strong="H7725"\w* from \w war|strong="H4421"\w*.\f + \fr 2.8 \ft of late: Heb. yesterday\f*\f + \fr 2.8 \ft with the: Heb. over against a\f*

The \w women|strong="H0802"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* have ye cast \w out|strong="H1644"\w* from their \w pleasant|strong="H8588"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*; from their \w children|strong="H5768"\w* have ye taken \w away|strong="H3947"\w* my \w glory|strong="H1926"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.\f + \fr 2.9 \ft women: or, wives\f*

\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w* ye, and \w depart|strong="H3212"\w*; for this \add is\add* not \add your\add* \w rest|strong="H4496"\w*: because it is \w polluted|strong="H2930"\w*, it shall \w destroy|strong="H2254"\w* \add you\add*, even with a \w sore|strong="H4834"\w* \w destruction|strong="H2256"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3863"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w walking|strong="H1980"\w* in the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* and \w falsehood|strong="H8267"\w* do \w lie|strong="H3576"\w*, \add saying\add*, I will \w prophesy|strong="H5197"\w* unto thee of \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* and of strong \w drink|strong="H7941"\w*; he shall even be the \w prophet|strong="H5197"\w* of this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.\f + \fr 2.11 \ft walking…: or, walk with the wind, and lie falsely\f*

¶ I will \w surely|strong="H0622"\w* \w assemble|strong="H0622"\w*, O \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, all of thee; I will \w surely|strong="H6908"\w* \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; I will \w put|strong="H7760"\w* them \w together|strong="H3162"\w* as the \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* of \w Bozrah|strong="H1223"\w*, as the \w flock|strong="H5739"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of their \w fold|strong="H1699"\w*: they shall make great \w noise|strong="H1949"\w* by reason of \add the multitude of\add* \w men|strong="H0120"\w*.

The \w breaker|strong="H6555"\w* is come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them: they have broken \w up|strong="H6555"\w*, and have passed \w through|strong="H5674"\w* the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, and are gone \w out|strong="H3318"\w* by it: and their \w king|strong="H4428"\w* shall \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them, and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* on the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of them.
